commits.message:
feat: add restore keys to cache definition

This change will still use a cache even if the Cargo.lock changes
slightly, allowing us to take advantage of prebuilt deps (which should
be the majority), or even switching from release -. debug (the registry
cache should still be fine)

pull_request.title: feat: cache deps for faster tests
pull_request.body:
Cache the cargo registry and build folder to speed up test times.

For now, we cache the `release` build and entire `~/.cargo/registry`

pull_request.title: feat: set host and port from env vars
pull_request.body:
The host and port were hardcoded until now.
This adds the feature to read in the host, port and ruleset path from environment variables, or else use defaults if they're missing.

issue.body:
The host and port were hardcoded until now.
This adds the feature to read in the host, port and ruleset path from environment variables, or else use defaults if they're missing.

issue.title: (RS-D1000) Use of `FIXME`/`XXX`/`TODO`
issue.body:
## Description
This block has been marked as `FIXME`/`XXX`/`TODO`. Perhaps you meant to address this?

## Occurrences
There are 3 occurrences of this issue in the repository.

See all occurrences on DeepSource → [deepsource.io/gh/tari-project/gh-pilot/issue/RS-D1000/occurrences/](https://deepsource.io/gh/tari-project/gh-pilot/issue/RS-D1000/occurrences/)

pull_request.title: feat: add aliases for commands
pull_request.body:
Adds alias for main commands
pull_request => pr
issue => iss
label => lab
contributors => users

labels.description: Please provide more detail in the PR description as to what this PR accomplishes

commits.message:
feat: fetch/add comments to api for repos & issues (#68)

* feat: fetch/add comments to api for repos & issues

Adds queries to github pilot API for adding & fecthing comments for
isues and prs.
Adds a Page type to handle pagination. If it workds nicely should be
rolled out to other meothds that support pagination.

* fix: issue comment fetcher

pull_request.title: feat: fetch/add comments to api for repos & issues
pull_request.body:
Adds queries to github pilot API for adding & fecthing comments for isues and prs.
Adds a Page type to handle pagination. If it workds nicely should be rolled out to other methods that support pagination.
